price: Vay olsun o qulların halına! Onlara elə bir elçi gəlməyib ki, ona istehza etməsinlər.
arabic: يَٰحَسۡرَةً عَلَى ٱلۡعِبَادِۚ مَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāḥasratan ʿalā al-ʿibādi mā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
